title: Elastomers | Reliance Industries Limited
description: We produce synthetic rubber under the brand names Relflex and Reliance Sibur Elastomers Pvt Ltd. Our elastomers are used across a variety of applications, including tyres, footwear, sports goods, rollers and mechanical fenders, and more.
keywords: elastomers, butyl rubber, styrene butadiene rubber, polybutadiene rubber, petrochemical companies in india
